title: Leaders in Innovation Fellowship (LIF-7)
description: Selected among global entrepreneurs for Royal Academy of Engineering's (UK) prestigious innovation leadership program

description: Awarded research funding by Fundação Araucária, ranked top 5% among 1,851 innovation projects competing statewide

title: Finalist - SENDI/COPEL Hackathon

title: 1st Place - BRAFITEC Scholarship
